ROM.Changelog: # Note : _Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._. - Added Ruthless Pixel Launcher - Fixed Notification Panel Lags - Added DU fruity pebbles - Added Statusbar Weather - Added Lockscreen Weather - Added AOS Logo in the statusbar - Themed power menu items - Added theme tile - Themed notification info text - Added Pocket lock - Animations are now reverted to its default state ( Smooth like clean AOSP ) - Fixed Expanded Desktop in dark theme - Organized launcher settings - Fling kb cursors: long press left/right to keep moving cursor - Fixed carrier label toggle - Removed large battery icon - Fixed slow thumbnails loading -Much More]]>
